v.1.3.0.0r3.description:
New Features!
- Deathlink
- A new Trap: MIDNIGHT TRAP
- Goal info is now displayed at the start of each day

Bug fixes:
- High Traffic issues (50+ Players in a sync) (hopefully...)
- Research being displayed wrong
- other... (aka stuff that i fixed but forgot to write down)

Hot Fix 1:  AP-World and Mod
- Fixed Deathlinks without message crashing the client
- Fixed Tipherth Goal not generating
- Fixed Rabbits spawning in the same department twice and making it completly orange
- Fixed Midnight Trap not working after the first time
v.1.3.0.0r3.title: The Midnight Murder Update

v1.0.0.0.description:
Official Release!
Added Traps and a AP-Display since the last version.
Fixed way to many bugs.
v1.0.0.0.title: v1.0.0.0

v1.0.0.1.description: Fixed an error causing only 4 of 17 Tool-Abnos to be obtainable.
v1.0.0.1.title: Tool Abno Hotfix

v1.0.0.2.description: Fixes a bug which allowed the sefira supression reward research screen to open, causing a softlock.
v1.0.0.2.title: Sefira Supression Hotfix

v1.1.0.0.description:
New Features:
- Safety check that you get a non-Tool abno on first day
- Max E.G.O cost for Aleph and WAW abnos (75 / 50)
- Adjustable Filler and Trap Items
- 2 new Traps (FALSE ALARM TRAP and QLIPHOTH MALFUNCTION TRAP)
- Binah Suppression Reward Rework (50% E.G.O Discount)
- Reworked Binah Research 1 (Recover E.G.O on death at 25% chance -> Less Meltdowns)  

Bugfixes:
- Fixed generation putting impossible to reach locations into early spheres
- Meltdown Immunity is no longer associated with sucessfull meltdown completion, instead with the meltdown completion item

Hotfix: 
- fixed traps not being added to the itempool
v1.1.0.0.title: The Logic Update

v1.2.0.0.description:
New Features!
- Expanded the ingame Display to show research and found Locations
- Added options for Whitenight and Apoc bird
- Added option for reduced locations

Bug FIxes!
- Fixed Mission Locations not being checked correctly
- Fixed Multi-Line strings breaking the console

Hot Fix! (Updated the AP-World and mod)
- Fixed items not being granted when in main menu without a save file
- Fixed all missions after Tiph not having the correct abno count requirements

Bug Fix Update: (2025-08-31)
- Fixed Binah Mission 1 not being completed correctly. (Looks a bit weird now but should complete at the end of a day...)
- Fixed an error in the apworld, which would assign too little abnos to complete longer games
- Fixed the 'dissolution' and 'day and dissolution goals' not generating (was a typo)

Hot Fix 2! (2025-08-02) (Updated only the AP-World)
- Fixed error on gen with addative locations off (Thank you Phénicia for finding this!)
v1.2.0.0.title: The Whitenight and Dark Days Update
